position: HR (Resource Management / Workforce Management / Talent Management) professional with 6 years of experience in IT industry

experience.title: Resource Management (Workforce Management) - Consultant
experience.description: Staffing and Resource Management• Analyzed and aligned resources as per skill with diverse account needs for 10+ clients.• Handles the allocation and de-allocation of resources using R2D2 tool to ensure <5% bench.• Validates requirements like demand, timelines, and career level and ensures coordination of panels for fulfilment through internal/external supply with appropriate fitment approval from the practice head.• Forecasts billability by analyzing past trends and confirmation of requirements with the accounts.Fresher Management• Seamlessly billed 800+ freshers right from getting them from the fresher pool, training as per Client requirements, shadow resource allocation and final deployment.• Onboard new joiners as a manager, and their walk-through with company guidelines, processes, and assets.• Created FAQ document to reduce 80% queries of the freshers and new joiners.Stakeholder Management• Co-ordinates the resource deployment among clients, bench pool, external hiring, and cross BU teams.• Handles Roll-off management, coordinates with the HR to minimize cost due to roll-off.• Synergize stakeholder needs through strategic analysis and innovative problem-solving.• Creates dashboards and publishes allocation data to leadership and demand supply tracker to accounts on weekly as well as monthly basis.• Manage foreign to domestic movement for the resources getting rolled-off from onsite roles.Learning & Development• Ensures Cards Foundation Training for all and top-up training as per industry requirements.• Proactively leverage the wealth of knowledge and experience within the organization to cultivate and empower existing talent through expert mentorship and targeted training initiatives.Timesheet Management• Manages timesheets for 300 employees by continuous monitoring and follow-up with the right POC.• Reduced the timesheet approval time remarkably from 10 hours to 2 hours/week through automation.
